manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oleavine TheraTree Natural Clarifying Toner Spray helps gently tone, smooth, and balance your skin while nourishing and hydrating problem skin. Our natural proprietary blend of organic plant hydrosols helps pH balance the skin while controlling oil and helping to diminish the appearance of pore size and blotchiness. Great for oily and poor complexion skin. Use before your favorite anti-aging serum or daily moisturizer for optimum hydration. Great for both body care and facial complexion while acting as a skin balancing toner for daily use. Key moisturizing ingredients Sodium PCA and Kosher Glycerin help hydrate dry skin and control red blotchy skin. Organic hydrosols include astringent witch hazel, tea tree, and neem leaf to helps reduce the appearance of pore size.

Oleavine TheraTree Clarifying Toner Multi-Purpose Toner for Poor Complexion, Help Reduce the Appearance of Pore Size, and Skin Balancing Proprietary Blend of Alcohol-Free Organic Hydrosols Include Tea Tree, Neem Leaf, Witch Hazel, Basil, Ginger, Lemongrass, and Spearmint Provide Astringency and Helps Maintain Proper Skin pH. Skin Nourishing MSM Helps Reduce Appearance of Poor Complexion, Reduces Redness, & Preps Skin for Serums and Moisturizers.Sodium PCA and Botanical Glycerin Deeply Hydrates and Moisturizes.Aspen Bark (Natural Salicylic Acid), Lactic and Phytic Acid Gently Exfoliate Dead Skin for Healthy Glowing Skin. Helps Control Excessive Oily Skin While Leaving Skin Soft and Moisturized.
Multi-Purpose Toner Skin Nourishing Ingredients Helps Balance Skin pHHelps Reduce Appearance of RednessHelps Hydrate SkinHelps Gently Exfoliate SkinAlcohol-Free Formula
Face and Body Toner Light Scent and Effective Helps Control Oily SkinHelps Moisturize SkinHelps Prep Skin for Serums and LotionsHelps Support Healthy Glowing SkinHelps Soften Skin

In Addition to the Oleavine TheraTree Toner, Complete Your Regimen with these Added Items... Step 1: Use the TheraTree Scrub for Exfoliating Dead Skin & Unclogging Pores. Step 2: Use the TheraTree Therapeutic Soap for Face & Body Wash. Step 3: Use the TheraTree Mask for Additional Skin Detox and Complexion Support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice toner for more oily or combo skin; I feel like it addresses my shine without adding another 'layer', and I also like that it's got a super light scent. I'm not a big fan of tea tree and how strong it smells and this one truly has minimal tea tree scent, rather more light and herbally. It's a great size for the price, good value and good performance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light Scent, Leaves Face Feeling Great
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite toner! I really don't have any complaints about it. I don't do well with strong scents, and this one is light and fresh. It leaves my face feeling clean and moisturized after cleansing. The tea tree oil and cucumber are a good combination for me. I sometimes use it during the day just as a pick-me-up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Yes and noo??
reviews.reviewText: Sooo I usually buy the tea tree water toner spray from lush but it's just a little expensive for not a whole lot (not that much of a price difference) so I decided to try something new.. so far I definitely like the lush spray much better but to be fair I have only been using this toner for around a week. I thought I'd give it a shot considering I absolutely love their exfoliating scrub!! But the issue I have with this spray is the smell & that's my fault for not reading carefully. It's cucumber scented and I already hate cucumbers but personally I just feel like the scent is not that great in general. Though, it's not unbearable.. I just wish I could try it without the cucumber. I will say my skin has felt softer after using the scrub and spray (idk if that's just the scrub, spray, or both?) but my acne is still not improving, which I definitely need to give it more time but so far the scent is almost a dealbreaker for me. I am planning to give it more of a chance, especially because I don't want to waste it. But the only way I will continue using this instead of lush again is if I dramatically see a change in my skin by the end! So I obviously have a lot of very personal opinions about it & everyone is different but truly, I feel 50/50 about it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleared my Skin
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been struggling with breakouts for about two years and was skeptical about how much this toner would help, as I’ve tried many products and even 2 different medications (none of which seemed to help much). I was having 2-3 new breakouts every day, some ofwhich were painful and all them them embarrassing. I used the toner 3 days ago at night and felt like I noticed an improvement when I woke up-no new breakouts and my skin seemed to feel happier and less irritated. I thought maybe it was just a coincidence, but after 3 days using it at night and in the morning, literally no new breakouts for the first time in years. My skin also feels healthier, less irritated, and the scarring even seems to be healing faster. I’m not sure why it has worked so well for me, but if you’re struggling with your skin, I highly recommend this! It’s also not drying at all, smells great to me, and feels so gentle on my skin. I’ve also been using a tiny dab of pure tea tree oil on spots and feel like that is helping them heal faster too. I could not be happier and already feel more confident having my skin be healthier in just a few days.I can’t wait to see the continued results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't really do much
reviews.reviewText: It smells okay, but doesn't really feel like it's benefiting me. I used this for a month, and made no difference to my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is so refreshing. Look forward to using this after washing my face. Pleasant smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a green smoothie for your face
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time I’ve ever called something a “holy grail” skin product, but it absolutely is! I’ll usually spritz a bit after washing my face, and it just smells so fresh and clean, not overly fragranced at all. It absorbs well into my skin and makes it feel refreshed and hydrated. I’ve been using it as a setting spray and it also does wonders getting my makeup to blend and stopping me from looking like a dry Daley mess when I use powder. I love how much you get as well. I’ve been using it almost daily for almost two years and just now ran out! I hope Oleavine stays in business forever and continues to make this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Product - WORKS!
reviews.reviewText: I REALLY like this product. It works--fast! I purchased this because my skin has been a little unhappy with the cold harsh weather. I've had a few pimples pop up, as a result and normally I just use Witch Hazel, which isn't strong enough to get rid of pimples fast. THIS product is! I noticed improvement after ONE use. My daughter, who experiences teenage acne is also using this product and her skin is improving quickly as well. I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a natural product to clear their skin and keep it from breaking out. The fragrance is a light cucumber mixed with tea tree oil scent. It fades very quickly but I find it pleasant when putting on my face. I prefer to use on a cotton ball versus spraying on my face. Just my own personal preference.
